name: The Luxury Paris Hotel
description:
DESCRIPTION
This Luxury Paris Hotel is a historic 4-star hotel located in the heart of Paris, close to department stores and cultural venues. The hotel will celebrate its 130th anniversary in 2019, and its 268 rooms and reception areas have been redesigned to meet the expectations of today's travelers. Inspired by the past and turned towards the future, this establishment redefines the standards of Parisian hospitality for a majestic wedding.
The Luxury Paris Hotel can host a wedding for up to 120 guests with the help of our expert planners. The Luxury Paris Hotel teams will be at your side to help you organize your event and take care of every detail. Thus, your celebration will remain etched in everyone's mind forever.
Our restored 1800s hotel includes ornate ballrooms, grand staircases and luxury bedrooms for your guests. The hotel is the perfect setting to celebrate a special occasion. The guests will thus benefit from the privileged location of the latter. Your event will be imbued with the elegance of this historic establishment and the charm of the sumptuous Baccarat lounge which accommodates up to 120 guests.
A range of catering packages are available which can be tailored to suit your needs. From your cocktail reception to your wedding breakfast, the hotel will make sure your day is absolutely perfect. The master of the kitchens, Eric, will delight your taste buds with his brand new creations of wedding menus. With his experience, he will be at your disposal after tasting your menu to adapt the service to your tastes and those of your guests.
Rooms at the Luxury Paris Hotel feature a relaxing color palette and exquisite details. Frescoes referring to the Parisian art of living adorn the walls. The 268 rooms are all elegantly decorated in a refined and modern style.
The 19th-century Parisian architecture emulates the romance of Paris and the hotel is located near the main attractions of the city - ideal for capturing perfect wedding photography and for exploring before and after the big day.
Le Grand Salon:
Located in the heart of the hotel, the highly decorative Le Grand Salon is the perfect opulent backdrop for your cocktail or after party.
The Ballroom:
The large ballroom with its chandeliers and elegant decoration will be exclusively yours for your wedding reception and can seat up to 120 guests.
Accommodation:
Designed in a classic Parisian style, the air-conditioned rooms have a minibar, USB port and a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms, and some rooms also include bathrobes and slippers. The private bathroom has heated flooring.
PRICING:
Sacre Coeur package at 179 € per person
Welcome reception during one hour:
Open bar Champagne 1 hour including: Champagne Domaine de Nuisement , a selection of alcohols, white wine, red wine, Fisher beer, Heineken beer, fruit juices & sodas.
6 cocktail pieces per person at the Chef's choice
Your Reception Dinner
Reception room available until midnight. From midnight, any additional hours started will be charged € 200 per hour up to 2 AM maximum.
The Sacre Coeur menu includes an appetizer with Chef's choice, a starter, a main course and a dessert as well as an assortment of sweets.
The drinks are based on ¼ white wine Petit Chablis Bourgogne 2014, ½ red wine Vacqueyras Bouvencourt , mineral and sparkling water & coffee / tea.
Flowers / Decoration / DJ are in supplement
Opera package at 209 € per person
Welcome reception during one hour
Open bar Champagne 1 hour including: Champagne Domaine de Nuisement , a selection of alcohols, white wine, red wine, Fisher beer, Heineken beer, fruit juices & sodas
6 cocktail pieces per person at the Chef's choice
Your Reception Dinner
Reception room available until midnight. From midnight, any additional hours started will be charged € 200 per hour up to 2 AM maximum.
The Opera menu includes an appetizer at Chef's choice, a starter, a main course and a dessert as well as an assortment of sweets.
The drinks are based on ¼ white wine Petit Chablis Bourgogne 2014, ½ red wine Vacqueyras Bouvencourt , mineral and sparkling water & coffee /A glass of champagne per guest to sublimate the dessert.
Minimum of 15 guests required for each package.
Bedroom pricing depends on the season so please enquire for more details.
Located in the heart of the captial the hotel offers you all the leisure to organize the most beautiful day of your life in the best conditions. Please get in touch for more information.
